semkit.extractor

Class DBPediaExtractor

  • java.lang.Object
    • semkit.extractor.DBPediaExtractor

  • public class DBPediaExtractor
extends java.lang.Object
    This Class is the one used to retrieve a DBPedia document and properties contained in it. See the sample class LODRetrievalSample.java for samples of uses.
    Author:
    ericcharton
